fields.value: Certified palm oil production and area

dsDescriptionValue.value: The dataset contain yearly data on number of RSPO certified growers and palm mills; production and certified area (expressed in hectare, and by country); annual production capacity of fresh fruit brunch, palm oil and palm kernel (expressed in metric ton); volume of certified pam supply (in metric ton), and uptake or sales of certified sustainable palm oil (in metric ton). In addition, the datasets also present the proportion of Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSPO) members by type of membership

distributorName.value: CGIAR Research Program on Forests, Trees and Agroforestry Dataverse

otherGeographicCoverage.value: Indonesia, Malaysia and other RSPO members

files.description: The dataset contain yearly data on number of RSPO certified growers and palm mills; production and certified area (expressed in hectare, and by country); annual production capacity of fresh fruit brunch, palm oil and palm kernel (expressed in metric ton); volume of certified pam supply (in metric ton), and uptake or sales of certified sustainable palm oil (in metric ton). In addition, the datasets also present the proportion of Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSPO) members by type of membership
